short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Set a goal when visiting distracting sites to keep focused.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Upon visiting a distracting website, you will be prompted to set a goal. That goal will appear in a draggable notification in the bottom right corner until you mark it complete. Then either go back to goal setting, or navigate to a chosen website.

After adding this extension, be sure to configure it for the websites you want.
